content: peachy the rat pine barron © 2015 danielle bash page 1 materials yarn body color worsted weight 4 color b color represents feet tail and ears 9mm safety eyes poly-fil or similar product for stuffing crochet hook us e/4-3 5mm stitch markers alternative is scrap yarn yarn needle straight pins what you need to know how to do/read in us terms magic_ring st- stitch chain- chain single_crochet- single_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet treble_crochet- triple crochet increase- increase decrease- decrease/decrease the invisible decrease method is preferred as it leaves a neater finish slip_stitch- slip_stitch working in a continuous spiral using a stitch marker to keep track of rounds working in row note items made using the pattern can be sold in your own shop as long as you are the one who makes them but credit for the design must be given to me and linked to my etsy or ravelry account mass production and redistribution of the pattern and its parts to others is prohibited it is for your private use only © danielle bash head/body page 2 round 1 8sc in magic_ring 8 round 30 increase single_crochet increase 8sc increase single_crochet increase 22sc 40 round
